description: This table contains the general information about the surgical log line (ORM) record. This table also contains the information that can apply to several different types of surgical log line records.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the line record for this row.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the line record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status category number for the line record. A null status means that the record is active.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive


Deleted


Inactive and Deleted


Hidden


Inactive and Hidden


Deleted and Hidden


Inactive Deleted and Hidden

columns.name: PREALL_REC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The pre-allocated record type category number for the line record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Pre-Allocated Record


Shell Record

columns.name: PREALLOCATED_LOG_ID
columns.description: The surgical log to which this record has been pre-allocated. If record is in use or was pre-allocated by the pre-allocation process, this item will not be populated.

columns.name: ORM_REC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The surgical log data type category number for the line record. For example, the types of data stored in line records include delays, staff, and equipment.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Anesthesia Staff


Anesthesia Equipment


Additional Anesthesia Staff


Anesthesia Complications


Blood Info


Adverse Events


Complications


Delays


Staff


Equipment


Instruments


Pre-op Prep


Pre-op Skin


Tourniquet Info


Post-op Prep


Post-op Skin


Visitors


Other Equipment


Pre-surgery Events


Counts


Pre-op Appointments


Post-op Appointments


Patient Positioning


Diagnosis/Procedure Info


Electro-surgery Devices


SCD Devices


X-Ray Devices


Laser Devices


Warming Devices


Specimens


Medications


Catheters, Drains, Packings


Implants


Arrival Therapies


Anesthesia/Diagnosis Info


OR Billing History

columns.name: MARKED_FOR_DEL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the line record has been marked for deletion. Y indicates the record has been marked for deletion. A null value indicates that the record has not been marked for deletion.  An N will not be populated for this column.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: ID of the log to which this ORM record belongs.

columns.name: PRESERVE_RECORD_YN
columns.description:
Determines whether the ORM resource needs to be preserved during rebuild since it has been documented in the log.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MARKED_FOR_DEL_YN

columns.name: MAN_ENTERED_TM_SEC
columns.description: The manually entered total time that a resource was used in seconds.

columns.name: LOANED_EQUIP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a particular piece of equipment is loaned or rented. Y indicates that the piece of equipment is loaned or rented. N indicates that the piece of equipment is not loaned or rented. A null value indicates that the line record is not any type of equipment or the value is not populated.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MARKED_FOR_DEL_YN

columns.name: LOANED_EQUIP_ID
columns.description: The ID of the loaned or rented piece of equipment that does not have a provider record in Epic.

columns.name: EQUIP_POSITION_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time a piece of equipment was positioned for use in a procedure.

columns.name: EQUIP_PRESSURE
columns.description: General item for storing the recorded equipment pressure, e.g. as measured on a CO2 Insufflator.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case whose log will contain this line of documentation.

columns.name: CREATED_EXTERNAL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this line of log documentation was created in an external system.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MARKED_FOR_DEL_YN

columns.name: PREP_AREA_MOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column displays the modifier for the prep area to allow a more discrete documentation of laterality.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: DEVICE_TEST_DTTM
columns.description: Item to document time at which device was tested.

columns.name: TTL_DISSIPATD_ENRGY
columns.description: The cumulative dissipated energy used by the equipment.

columns.name: EQUIP_FLOW_RATE
columns.description: The flow rate for the equipment.

columns.name: EQUIP_TOTAL_ENERGY
columns.description: The total energy used by the equipment.

columns.name: MAN_ENTERED_TM_MIN
columns.description: The total length of time the tourniquet was inflated (in minutes).

columns.name: DEFIB_NUM_APPLIED
columns.description: Stores the number of times the defibrillator was used on the patient.

columns.name: EQUIP_MEASURED_LEN
columns.description: This item stores the length measured by a piece of equipment.

columns.name: FREQUENCY
columns.description: This column stores the equipment frequency.

columns.name: STAFF_NOTIFIED_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the time that staff were notified.

columns.name: BACKGROUND_READING
columns.description: Reading of the background radiation
